headline: Why the World Is Suddenly Awash With a Wave of Co-CEOs
summary: Comcast, Oracle, and more have named Co-CEOs. The structure has worked in the past, but some say it makes no sense.

headline: Evercore ISI Reaffirms its Outperform Rating on Netflix Inc. (NFLX) with a $1,375 Price Target
summary: With a strong profitability outlook, Netflix Inc. (NASDAQ:NFLX) secures a spot on our list of the 14 Stocks That Will Double in the Next 5 Years. On September 22, 2025, Evercore ISI reaffirmed its Outperform rating on Netflix Inc. (NASDAQ:NFLX) with a $1,375 price target, citing high U.S. penetration, strong subscriber satisfaction, 14.84% revenue growth, and a […]

headline: Spotify stock drops after Daniel Ek says he’ll step down as CEO in 2026
summary: Spotify shares fell after CEO Daniel Ek announced he will step down and transition to executive chairman in 2026, as investors weighed the leadership change alongside weak earnings and softer guidance.
